name: Granny (itch) (SniperChancla)
description:
Story :

You are THE GRANNY and together with your amazing Portal-Forming-Platypus, you set out on a Mission to save your 2 lost Friends from a mysterious Forest Creature. 

Surely everything will go splendid and nothing could go wrong.... Right?

Features:

- 3 Levels                                                                      

- 2 unique Enemies                                                               

- Multiple Cutscenes

Controls:

A/D : Movement

Space : Jump

SHIFT : Dash

A/D & Space : Wall jump

Hold A/D : Slide down Walls

Left Mouse Button : Attack

How to Play:

- Download

- Unpack

- Enjoy

Programs used:

- Unity

- Aseprite
